title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: E.W.", 1930–45
medium: Pen and black, yellow ink on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: E. W.; upper right: 811
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Monogram comprised of letter "E" formed by two long horizontal elements joined by two semi-circles all in thin black lines, superimposed on a similarly designed yellow "W" arranged vertically.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: E.W.", 1930–45.
1930–45. Pen and black, yellow ink on cream illustration board. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-106.
